ca.qc.johnabbott.cs406.serialization.io

Class BufferedChannel

  • Object
    • ca.qc.johnabbott.cs406.serialization.io.BufferedChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destination, Source

    public class BufferedChannel
extends Object
implements Source, Destination
    Read/write to a channel. - Can be used as either a Source or Destination (but not both at the same time).
